transcript.text: My dear fellow citizens,
my dear european friends,
It is 9 May, 2017.
It is not a day like any other.
Sixty-seven years ago,
on the 9th of May, 1950,
Robert Schuman, here, in Paris,
proposed to Europe
a project that many considered insane,
inappropriate, unattainable.
An essential project.
A project that changed our lives,
the project of building Europe!
The project which brought us to the European Union that is today, ours.
A project that brought us
to the Europe of today.
A project, that was , lauched 67 years ago,
allowed our Continent to reach that promise of peace, of freedom, and of prosperity
that was this initial promise.
There are many actors of this Europe that is ours today,
many women and men took their responsibility
in several countries, at many levels.
But this 9th of may 1950, changed our History.
And this is what we are celebrating today
This Europe has accomplished  a  great deal.
we have  obtained  peace,
since then,
something our continent had never experienced as long
we've obtained  freedom, our freedom!
supported, protected, and
all through  the 5 coming years,
I will fight
so that anywhere in our European Union,
our political and individual freedom
our primary rights be anywhere
respected, so that we retain this example
everywhere in the world
Of course, Europe today is facing enomous challenges
We are aware of them
International threats are constantly present,
which cruelly stroke  us several times,
Doubts about ongoing transformations,
is present in all minds, in all lives,
the unfairness of globalization,
cruelly hit many of our territories.
It is therefore not our goal to go on with a Europe
of the 50's that would be frozen for ever
If we want to deserve
this anniversary
of this 9th of may, 1950,
we need to rebuild our Europe.
we must go further.
french men and women,
gave me their confidence on this last 7th of may,
electing me President of the French Republic
On a clear European Project
On the only European Project that has been brought during this presential campain
This is the one I intend to promote
So that France eand French succeed,
and also for the whole EEC
It is neither the defense of a naive Europe,
sometimes unefficient,
unsufficient,
nor to come back to an old Europe, a past Europe that never existed
what we need is a conquering Europe,
on the Climate,
In terms
of collective safety
Of international relations, of a strong Europe,
that can talk to the US, China, and so many other leaders
A Europe that defends its principles on all places of operation
as towards all major countries on the globe.
A Europe that defends its causes,
But we also need a Europe that protects
that protects the workers
the employees
the artisans, shop-owners, independants,
who protects his academics,
young as old citizen
A Europe that guarantees a coherence, a cohesion,
in a world with increasing uncertainties,
and more and more shaked.
This is the project I want to carry,
This is the project that I will, as soon as next week, once officially nominated
present and share with Chancelor Merkel
and the project that, during the following weeks, I want to share with all of the European leaders,
and with all of the European Institutions
I won't be a sitting President
You got it, I am a President of the French Republic who wants that
the Europe of Today and Tomorrow,
can get back on track
that it be proud of yersterday's promises, to carry tomorrow's promises
for the youth of our continent
our European Project be their pride
Therefore, today, 9th of may 2017,
Long live europe, Long live the Republic, long live France
